titles.title: Special Drawing Rights Oversight Act
To require that all Special Drawing Rights allocations be authorized by Congress in law.
Special Drawing Rights Oversight Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: International monetary system and foreign exchange

bill.summary:
Special Drawing Rights Oversight Act
This bill requires congressional approval for a vote to allocate any Special Drawing Rights (a currency support tool available to members of the International Monetary Fund). Currently, congressional approval is required only for allocations that exceed a specified amount.
